subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With Joe Johnson sidelined with a heel injury, Deron Williams has stepped up for the Nets. He scored 33 points, 11 in the final 90 seconds, against the Hornets.
snippet: With Joe Johnson sidelined with a heel injury, Deron Williams has stepped up for the Nets. He scored 33 points, 11 in the final 90 seconds, against the Hornets.
